channel.title: The Trade Jutsu
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The Trade Jutsu"

item.title: Re: The Trade Jutsu
item.content:encoded:
I believe that you have to be on the proper mission, but I cannot confirm that.

Personally, I'm intending to go for Anonymous first to get his theme first. The jutsu are of secondary concern for me.

item.title: The Trade Jutsu
item.content:encoded:
So when you finish the Trade you get Anonymus or Rights jutsuâ€¦. Which is better and

Anonymous Lvl. 2 - The Thrill of Victory. 300000 XP. -100 Stamina, Automatically level allies that can be leveled in a regular mission : 600 C.

Does that mean if I have Stalkergirl, Pinky, and Billy in my party they all level? or does it have to be in the mission they level in or can it be any mission?
